head.title: Ms. Kremins Weds R. S. Rosenthal

hedline.hl1: Ms. Kremins Weds R. S. Rosenthal

block.p: Carolyn Kremins, beauty manager of Elle magazine, and Robert S. Rosenthal, a senior vice president of TBWA Advertising, both in New York, were married yesterday by Rabbi Judith Lewis at the New York Academy of Art.

Ms. Kremins, 30 years old, is keeping her name. She graduated from the State University of New York at Oneonta and the Fashion Institute of Technology. She is a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Harold Kremins of Wantagh, L.I. Her father, who is retired, was a partner in Harlyn Textiles in New York.

Carolyn Kremins, beauty manager of Elle magazine, and Robert S. Rosenthal, a senior vice president of TBWA Advertising, both in New York, were married yesterday by Rabbi Judith Lewis at the New York Academy of Art.

Ms. Kremins, 30 years old, is keeping her name. She graduated from the State University of New York at Oneonta and the Fashion Institute of Technology. She is a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Harold Kremins of Wantagh, L.I. Her father, who is retired, was a partner in Harlyn Textiles in New York.

Mr. Rosenthal, 34, graduated from Lehigh University. He is a son of Irvin Rosenthal of New York and Marlene Schell of Woodmere, L.I. His previous marriage ended in divorce. His mother is a guidance counselor at Garden City (L.I.) High School. His father is a partner in the law firm of Rosenthal & Shays in New York.
